name: MXForegroundExitData
desc: An object representing counts for the different types of foreground app exits.

items.name: var cumulativeNormalAppExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the app exited normally from the foreground.

items.name: var cumulativeAbnormalExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the app exited abnormally from the foreground.

items.name: var cumulativeAppWatchdogExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system watchdog terminated the app from the foreground.

items.name: var cumulativeMemoryResourceLimitExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the foreground for using too much memory.

items.name: var cumulativeBadAccessExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the foreground for attempting an invalid memory access.

items.name: var cumulativeIllegalInstructionExitCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times the system terminated the app from the foreground for attempting to execute an illegal or undefined instruction.
